data.Sentence_cn: 威尔河是横穿过我家附近公园的一条小河。
data.Sentence: The Wayle is a small river that cuts across the park near my home.

data.Sentence_cn: 我喜欢在天气晴朗的下午到河边坐坐。
data.Sentence: I like sitting by the Wayle on fine afternoons.

data.Sentence_cn: 上星期日天气很暖和。于是我和往常一样，又去河边坐着。
data.Sentence: It was warm last Sunday, so I went and sat on the river bank as usual.

data.Sentence_cn: 河岸上有些孩子正在玩耍，河面上有些人正在划船。
data.Sentence: Some children were playing games on the bank and there were some people rowing on the river.

data.Sentence_cn: 突然，一个孩子狠狠地踢了一脚球，球便向着一只划过来的小船飞去。
data.Sentence: Suddenly, one of the children kicked a ball very hard and it went towards a passing boat.

data.Sentence_cn: 岸上的一些人对着小船上的人高喊，但他没有听见。
data.Sentence: Some people on the bank called out to the man in the boat, but he did not hear them.

data.Sentence_cn: 球重重地打在他身上，使他差点儿落入水中。
data.Sentence: The ball struck him so hard that he nearly fell into the water.

data.Sentence_cn: 我转过头去看那些孩子，但一个也不见，全都跑了！
data.Sentence: I turned to look at the children, but there weren't any in sight:they had all run away!

data.Sentence_cn: 当那个人明白了发生的事情时，笑了起来。
data.Sentence: The man laughed when he realized what had happened.

data.Sentence_cn: 他大声叫着那些孩子，把球扔回到岸上。
data.Sentence: He called out to the children and threw the ball back to the bank.
